nodes.text: Hua was a male Human who served as a quartermaster in the Republic Army during the Cold War with the Sith Empire, when he was stationed the space station Carrick Station.

Quartermaster Hua appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Rakata Gear Vendor for the Trooper class, though he was later removed during a reorganization of the gear system.
